doc:
Ad-Rock https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ad-Rock 0 Adam Keefe Horovitz (born October 31, 1966), better known as Ad-Rock or King Ad-Rock, is an American rapper, guitarist and actor. He is best known as a member of the hip hop group the Beastie Boys. He is married to musician and feminist activist Kathleen Hanna. Adam_Keefe_Horovitz ( born October_31_,_1966 ) , better_known as Ad-Rock or King_Ad-Rock , is an_American_rapper , guitarist_and_actor . He is_best_known as a_member of the_hip_hop group the_Beastie_Boys . He is_married to musician_and_feminist_activist_Kathleen_Hanna .
